Class LDAPController

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nemerosa.ontrack.ui.controller.AbstractResourceController
      • net.nemerosa.ontrack.extension.support.AbstractExtensionController<LDAPExtensionFeature>
        • net.nemerosa.ontrack.extension.ldap.LDAPController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/extension/ldap")
public class LDAPController
extends AbstractExtensionController<LDAPExtensionFeature>
    API for the LDAP mappings.
